channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingID Desktop for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingID Desktop for Windows

item.title: CVE-2022-40725|2024-08-03T12:21:46.675Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20desktop%20for%20windows
item.description: PingID Desktop prior to the latest released version 1.7.4 contains a vulnerability that can be exploited to bypass the maximum PIN attempts permitted before the time-based lockout is activated.
